name: Ted
text:
Ted
Ted was a member of the 24th Street Gang who stole Dale Cooper's tape recorder in January 1968.
At the age of sixteen, Ted was convicted of manslaughter and was the victim of various assaults while serving his sentence. During his first year of incarceration, he decided to eschew a life of crime after watching a snowstorm, particularly taking note of the large snowflakes.
He met Cooper again on December 26, 1975 and discussed his time in prison and his life since. As of this meeting, Ted was working two jobs and studying to become an accountant.
